author: cbs8
title: Attention DryShips Shareholders - BrokerBank Securities Furnishes Critical Due Diligence
text:
BrokerBank Securities, Inc.
NEW YORK , Aug. 31, DryShips, Inc. (NASDAQ: DRYS), saw their shares rise 33% last week to close at $.44 . These shares are still off from their July 27th price of $.68 .
Our due diligence has gathered information about the company and the market as well. To view critical due diligence use the link below.
http://bit.ly/_DRYS_Due_Diligence
About Dryships, Inc.
The company operates through its Drybulk, Tanker, and Drilling segments. The Drybulk segment provides dry bulk commodities transportation services for the steel, electric utility, construction, and agri-food industries. The Drilling segment offers ultra-deep water drilling services. The Tanker segment provides transportation services of crude and refined petroleum cargoes.
Copy and paste to browser may be required.
About Republic Airways Holdings, Inc.
Republic Airways Holdings Inc., through its subsidiaries, provides scheduled passenger services. The company offers scheduled passenger service on approximately 1,229 flights daily to approximately 101 cities in the U.S. and Canada .

Affiliated parties involved with producing and issuing this release have not been compensated in any form by any source. A full disclaimer can be found by viewing due diligence. We are only human and may make mistakes. If you notice any errors or omissions, please notify us below.
